title: Creates restrictions on where EBT cards may be used to access cash
summary: Amends the social services law and banking law, in relation to prohibiting automated teller machines or point of sale terminals in certain locations from accepting electronic benefit transfer cards for cash withdrawals
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          117

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  REILICH,  MONTESANO,  FINCH -- read once and
         referred to the Committee on Banks

       AN ACT to amend the social services law and the banking law, in relation
         to prohibiting automated teller machines or point of sale terminals in
         certain locations from accepting electronic benefit transfer cards for
         cash withdrawals

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. The social services law is amended by adding a new section
    2  144-b to read as follows:
    3    S 144-B. PROHIBITION OF THE USE OF ELECTRONIC BENEFIT  TRANSFER  CARDS
    4  IN  CERTAIN LOCATIONS. THE OFFICE OF TEMPORARY AND DISABILITY ASSISTANCE
    5  SHALL INSURE THAT  ELECTRONIC  BENEFIT  TRANSFER  CARDS  ISSUED  BY  AND
    6  THROUGH  THE  AGENCY TO FACILITATE THE DELIVERY OF ASSISTANCE MAY NOT BE
    7  USED TO ACCESS STATE-PROVIDED CASH BENEFITS FROM  ANY  AUTOMATED  TELLER
    8  MACHINES  OR POINT OF SALE TERMINALS IN GAMBLING ESTABLISHMENTS THROUGH-
    9  OUT THE STATE.
   10    S 2. The banking law is amended by adding a new section 9-v to read as
   11  follows:
   12    S 9-V. PROHIBITION OF THE USE OF ELECTRONIC BENEFIT TRANSFER CARDS  AT
   13  AUTOMATED  TELLER  MACHINES  IN  CERTAIN  LOCATIONS.  ELECTRONIC BENEFIT
   14  TRANSFER CARDS ISSUED BY THE STATE TO FACILITATE THE DELIVERY OF ASSIST-
   15  ANCE MAY NOT BE USED TO ACCESS STATE-PROVIDED  CASH  BENEFITS  FROM  ANY
   16  AUTOMATED  TELLER MACHINES OR POINT OF SALE TERMINALS IN GAMBLING ESTAB-
   17  LISHMENTS THROUGHOUT THE STATE.
   18    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04103-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the banking law, in relation to prohibiting automated teller machines or point of sale terminals in certain locations from accepting electronic benefit transfer cards for cash withdrawals
